data.title: St Mary the Virgin, Bathwick
data.meta_description: An Anglican (Church of England) church in Bath
data.text:
St Maryâs celebrates the Catholic faith and order of the Church of England. They welcome you to share with them in their splendid building and dignified worship.

Has an evening service

Near the city centre

Near a Sunday bus route

Has families and children

Has a choir

Service details

8.00 am Holy Communion

10.30 am Parish Eucharist

6.00 pm Evensong on the 1st and 3rd Sundays of the month

Parish priest

The Rev Peter Edwards

Bus routes
